item.title: Mabley green trees - rear of Eastway, 29th July
item.description:
Iâ€™ve lived on Eastway, for nearly 10 years. The trees behind my house were trimmed once, soon after we moved in, but not since. They now overhang into our garden and toward the house. Other nearby trees have been maintained, but not these. Please advise -

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eastway, Hackney, London

item.title: Pertruding hedge, 29th July
item.description:
Hedge oposite my house petruding onto public pathway has now become a stashspot for junkies. Have noticed the same people on multiple ocations 1 looks like he puts something down and the others will come and collect by the looks of it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Homerton Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: Overhanging bushes, 29th July
item.description:
Trees need to be cut back against my fence, they are damaging my fencing and overhanging on my gardening significantly. They are extremely prickly and despite you cutting the grass in the park, no one ever prunes the bushes !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Coming off of the A2 London bound slip road to merge with the A282 Dartford Tunnel approach, 29th July
item.description:

item.title: Very large prolific graffiti tag on the mdf boards around the perimeter of this house (former Housing Association HMO, now empty) on the junction of Croydon Rd and Melvin Rd. Also there are a pair of large tags on the ground floor perforated security shutters., 29th July
item.description:
Very large prolific graffiti tag on the mdf boards around the perimeter of this house (former Housing Association HMO, now empty) on the junction of Croydon Rd and Melvin Rd. Also there are a pair of large tags on the ground floor perforated security shutters. Seen 28/7/25. Very unsightly especially in this prominent location. I see one previous report got owner permission for the free removal, but on another occasion the waiver was refused
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melvin Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
